name: Lekki Conservation Centre
address: KM 19, Lekki-Epe Expressway, Lekki Peninsula, Lagos
description: A large nature reserve with canopy walks, monkeys, and picnic spots.

name: Nike Art Gallery
address: No. 2, Elegushi Rd, Lekki Phase I, Lagos
description: A vibrant art gallery showcasing Nigerian artists and crafts.

name: Lekki Market
description: A bustling market known for its crafts, textiles, and local produce.

name: Elegushi Beach
address: Elegushi Beach Rd, Lekki Phase I, Lagos
description: A popular beach destination with restaurants, bars, and nightlife.

name: Lekki Leisure Lake
address: Lekki Leisure Lake Resort, Lekki Peninsula, Lagos
description: A serene lake offering boat rides and water sports activities.
